text: I would never in a million years have
guessed that ten days after surgery I
would be out running around shop and
walking the neighborhood
life is grand the first couple of days
are the hardest four days later I feel
like a new person I was able to get up
get out of bed walk around tolerate
fluids get a shower it's just this
little incision and you know you take
your bandage off you get in the shower
you let the warm soapy water run over it
doesn't hurt at all it just it heals
from the inside out and it'll eventually
close on its own I am now eating chicken
and fish shrimp eggs cottage cheese
bananas
string cheese you know salt foods that
you're it's very very important that the
food is moist I mean definitely you're
checking your turkey it's got to be
moist I have learned that your bites
have to be very small that's been a big
challenge you use I'm used to taking a
big bite and then chew in it up fairly
small and then swallowing now your bites
literally need to be about the size of
an eraser on a pencil and so that's
that's a big change and then you need to
chew that very thoroughly because it
will hurt going down otherwise so forces
you to slow down but I was amazed I had
a piece of fish yesterday just a little
too obviously I think I ate maybe a
third of it and was too full and this
morning breakfast was half a scrambled
egg I think I expected that I would go
in and I would have surgery I would feel
bad for a month or so I would slowly get
to moving around maybe tolerating a
little bit of fluid here and there and
that it would just be this long
drawn-out process of recovery I'm ten
days out and I think day six I was out
shopping I mean really it's been amazing
amazing I am down 23 pounds since
starting the liquid diet 10 days before
surgery I'm wearing jeans I haven't worn
in two years I mean that was just talk
about a happy moment I think I did like
I said a little happy dance that I was
able to put these jeans on I'm wearing
blouses that I couldn't wear before that
because they were so tight around my
midsection
it's embarrassing nobody wants to look
like that so I wear blouses now that I
couldn't wear before everything it's
just that little bit of weight it's it's
easier to do anything it's easier to
walk around it's easier to sit in the
chair when you go somewhere it's that
little bit starting off has set me on
fire in the next thirty days I should
expect another 15 to 20 pounds of weight
loss then after that I'm looking at a
pound and a half to two pounds per week
I have not been hungry at all I've not
felt the first hunger pain at all it's
and it's the oddest feeling sometimes
you think my goodness it's dinnertime
you know it's a speed the kids you know
see the family and why I'm not even
hungry
you don't think about food all the time
anymore whereas that food was
controlling me before this now I can
control it for the first time in years I
have hope about my weight I mean I don't
even know how to express that I have
hope that I won't be obese forever that
I would I do I feel better already so
there's this there's this fire that's
been instilled in me and now to how much
better can I feel when I lose 60 pounds
when I lose 80 pounds what's life going
to be like then because right right now
life is grand I think if people really
knew that you can do this it's not
horrible it just takes commitment I mean
you you have to be mentally prepared to
do this and once you get to that point
that you're mentally prepared it's
there's no stopping it's amazing it's
it's not as scary as I thought it would
be I was terrified in the beginning now
I just want everyone to know it's not
that bad just be committed
you
